content.raw: Not sure where the ``2x4x1_box.dae`` should go ... right now it's in ``media/materials/textures`` as it's the only "reasonable" directly that gets installed right now (it's only needed for proper texture mapping for the 2 by 4 rubble pieces).
content.html: Not sure where the 2x4x1_box.dae should go ... right now it's in media/materials/textures as it's the only "reasonable" directly that gets installed right now (it's only needed for proper texture mapping for the 2 by 4 rubble pieces).

content.raw: Thanks for this pull-request. We'll get to integrating it later this week, early next week. Right now we are focusing on wrapping up features required for qualifications.

content.raw:
Thomas, sorry for the delay on these pull requests. I was just testing this, and I think it will be hard to merge. It's easy to mess up merges from forks with Bitbucket. The issue is that this pull request will create multiple heads if it's merged. Also, it appears that your fork already has multiple heads, due to the following commit.
~~~
changeset:   7622:0029e32a48e6
parent:      7619:092e6ddb21ee
user:        faller
date:        Wed Apr 10 06:00:22 2013 -0400
summary:     making grass brigher and greener
~~~
I made pull request #492 by copying your changes, and I think it will merge easier. Please approve it if it matches your intentions.

changeset:   7622:0029e32a48e6

content.raw:
Thanks Steve. I'll check your copy later today when I'm back at the lab.
The drcsim pull-request will be the most difficult to merge I think. ;) I already had my fun time trying to merge the current default in a few days ago.
